00005 #ifndef LUABIND_ITERATOR_POLICY__071111_HPP
00006 # define LUABIND_ITERATOR_POLICY__071111_HPP
00007 
00008 # include <luabind/config.hpp>
00009 # include <luabind/detail/policy.hpp>
00010 # include <luabind/detail/convert_to_lua.hpp>
00011 
00012 namespace luabind { namespace detail {
00013 
00014 template <class Iterator>
00015 struct iterator
00016 {
00017     static int next(lua_State* L)
00018     {
00019         iterator* self = static_cast<iterator*>(
00020             lua_touserdata(L, lua_upvalueindex(1)));
00021 
00022         if (self->first != self->last)
00023         {
00024             convert_to_lua(L, *self->first);
00025             ++self->first;
00026         }
00027         else
00028         {
00029             lua_pushnil(L);
00030         }
00031 
00032         return 1;
00033     }
00034 
00035     static int destroy(lua_State* L)
00036     {
00037         iterator* self = static_cast<iterator*>(lua_touserdata(L, 1));
00038         self->~iterator();
00039         return 0;
00040     }
00041 
00042     iterator(Iterator first, Iterator last)
00043       : first(first)
00044       , last(last)
00045     {}
00046 
00047     Iterator first;
00048     Iterator last;
00049 };
00050 
00051 template <class Iterator>
00052 int make_range(lua_State* L, Iterator first, Iterator last)
00053 {
00054     void* storage = lua_newuserdata(L, sizeof(iterator<Iterator>));
00055     lua_newtable(L);
00056     lua_pushcclosure(L, iterator<Iterator>::destroy, 0);
00057     lua_setfield(L, -2, "__gc");
00058     lua_setmetatable(L, -2);
00059     lua_pushcclosure(L, iterator<Iterator>::next, 1);
00060     new (storage) iterator<Iterator>(first, last);
00061     return 1;
00062 }
00063 
00064 template <class Container>
00065 int make_range(lua_State* L, Container& container)
00066 {
00067     return make_range(L, container.begin(), container.end());
00068 }
00069 
00070 struct iterator_converter
00071 {
00072     typedef iterator_converter type;
00073 
00074     template <class Container>
00075     void apply(lua_State* L, Container& container)
00076     {
00077         make_range(L, container);
00078     }
00079 
00080     template <class Container>
00081     void apply(lua_State* L, Container const& container)
00082     {
00083         make_range(L, container);
00084     }
00085 };
00086 
00087 struct iterator_policy : conversion_policy<0>
00088 {
00089     static void precall(lua_State*, index_map const&)
00090     {}
00091 
00092     static void postcall(lua_State*, index_map const&)
00093     {}
00094 
00095     template <class T, class Direction>
00096     struct apply
00097     {
00098         typedef iterator_converter type;
00099     };
00100 };
00101 
00102 }} // namespace luabind::detail
